tool_description: Validates backup file integrity, accessibility, and completeness to ensure backups are valid before making retention decisions.

backup_paths.description: List of backup file paths to validate

validation_level.description: Validation depth: basic, standard, or thorough

skip_large_files.description: Skip integrity checks for files larger than 10GB

timeout_seconds.description: Maximum time to spend validating each backup (30-3600 seconds)

error_messages: Invalid validation level: Use one of [basic, standard, thorough].
Backup paths limit exceeded: Maximum 1000 backup files can be validated in a single operation.
Invalid timeout value: timeout_seconds must be between 30 and 3600.
File access denied: Some backup files are not accessible due to permission issues.
usage: Provide backup_paths array to validate backup integrity. Set validation_level and timeout_seconds based on your requirements. Use skip_large_files=false for complete validation of large backups.

validation_results.description: Validation results for each backup in format: path|status|details

valid_backups.description: List of backup paths that passed validation

invalid_backups.description: List of backup paths that failed validation

validation_summary.description: Overall validation summary with success/failure counts and recommendations
